### getPassName() {#a88485730b9155d1f1a9f79b1f40b8c91}

  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
getPassName - Return a nice clean name for a pass.

This usually implemented in terms of the name that is registered by one of the Registration templates, but can be overloaded directly.

## Private Member Functions

### addENDBR() {#af37d7031e2cab97aebe26269cf47e632}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool X86IndirectBranchTrackingPass::addENDBR (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> I) const</>}>
Adds a new ENDBR instruction to the beginning of the MBB.

The function will not add it if already exists. It will add ENDBR32 or ENDBR64 opcode, depending on the target. 
<SectionUser title="Returns">
true if the ENDBR was added and false otherwise.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86indirectbranchtracking-cpp/#l00062">62</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86indirectbranchtracking-cpp">X86IndirectBranchTracking.cpp</a>.
